PatentsView-Evaluation‚Äôs documentation#

PatentsView-Evaluation is a Python package for the evaluation and benchmarking of PatentsView disambiguation algorithms.

To get started, please refer to the README, the examples page, or the API documentation. Use the project‚Äôs Discussion page to ask questions and the Issues page to request features and report bugs.
